mapper.insert: insert into trpl (sn, brd_sn, user_id, comment_group, content, status) values (#{sn}, #{brdSn}, #{userId}, #{commentGroup}, #{content}, #{status})
mapper.select: select r.sn, r.brd_sn, r.user_id, u.name, r.comment_group, r.cnt, r.status, r.reg_date, r.upd_date from trpl r, tuser u where r.user_id = u.id and sn = #{sn}
mapper.update: update trpl set user_id = #{userId}, content = #{content}, cnt = #{cnt}, status = #{status}, upd_date = current_date where sn = #{sn}
mapper.select: select count(*) from trpl where brd_sn = #{brd_sn}
